function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty in accessing finance for SMEs","Impact":"Limited growth and performance of SMEs, especially during challenges like COVID-19","Mitigation":"Government intervention through credit guarantee schemes and other financial instruments","Technologies":"Financial modeling, risk analysis tools","People":"SMEs, government, banks","Owner":"Government"},{"Description":"High loan default risk ratio (NPL/L)","Impact":"Increased financial burden on banks, decreased confidence in lending, potential economic instability","Mitigation":"Government policies for NPL reduction, banking soundness improvement","Technologies":"Risk analysis tools, economic modeling software","People":"Banks, government, borrowers","Owner":"Government"}]}
